# v5.3.0 (2018-12-17)
### Improvements
* StepSequence and StepSequenceItem components are added.
* ESLint now allows the test function to get through linting.
* Added new News section with a page which shows the upcoming work with the Sage Design System.

### Bug Fixes
* [#1868](https://github.com/Sage/carbon/issues/1868) - Fixes a boolean warning error that `Form` was rendering incorrectly.
